20110114171604.000|20110114171606.000|TR0|his repair shop.  He got the goat to trim 
20110114171606.000|20110114171609.000|TR0|his lawn initially, but wouldn't you know 
20110114171609.000|20110114171611.000|TR0|it? The neighbors complained, so Z moved

20110114171719.000|20110114171722.000|TR0|
20110114171722.000|20110114171724.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  OK.  So can you explain this 
20110114171724.000|20110114171727.000|TR0|process, though?  The first step is now 
20110114171727.000|20110114171729.000|TR0|taken, and it's because the Church 
20110114171729.000|20110114171732.000|TR0|determined, or the Vatican determined, 
20110114171732.000|20110114171734.000|TR0|that Pope John Paul performed a miracle.  
20110114171734.000|20110114171736.000|TR0|And he did this after death.
20110114171736.000|20110114171739.000|TR0|
20110114171739.000|20110114171741.000|TR0|MARTIN:  Well, actually, God performs the 
20110114171741.000|20110114171744.000|TR0|miracle.  The idea is that people pray to 
20110114171744.000|20110114171746.000|TR0|John Paul for his help, for his prayers 
20110114171746.000|20110114171749.000|TR0|from heaven, and then God perform this is 
20110114171749.000|20110114171751.000|TR0|miracle.  And it's a sign taken by the 
20110114171751.000|20110114171754.000|TR0|Church that John Paul is in heaven and is 
20110114171754.000|20110114171756.000|TR0|worthy of this beatification.
20110114171756.000|20110114171758.000|TR0|
20110114171758.000|20110114171801.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  And in this case, it was a nun

20110114171808.000|20110114171811.000|TR0|MARTIN:  Well, she was.  Her congregation 
20110114171811.000|20110114171813.000|TR0|prayed to John Paul for his prayers, and 
20110114171813.000|20110114171816.000|TR0|she was literally cured overnight.  There 
20110114171816.000|20110114171818.000|TR0|was no scientific explanation of this.  
20110114171818.000|20110114171820.000|TR0|She did not go back to the Parkinson's,

20110114171907.000|20110114171909.000|TR0|
20110114171909.000|20110114171912.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  So how does that exactly work?  
20110114171912.000|20110114171914.000|TR0|I mean, do people call in to the Vatican

20110114171919.000|20110114171921.000|TR0|life, or help performed a miracle? Because

20110114171924.000|20110114171926.000|TR0|
20110114171926.000|20110114171929.000|TR0|MARTIN:  Yes, it's a very strict process.  
20110114171929.000|20110114171931.000|TR0|You know, they have a team of medical 
20110114171931.000|20110114171934.000|TR0|experts, many of them non-Catholics, who 
20110114171934.000|20110114171936.000|TR0|pore over medical records.  And you not 
20110114171936.000|20110114171939.000|TR0|only have to have medical records 
20110114171939.000|20110114171941.000|TR0|afterwards, but beforehand, so people can 
20110114171941.000|20110114171943.000|TR0|tell whether or not there was actually an 
20110114171943.000|20110114171946.000|TR0|illness, whether it was incurable, whether 
20110114171946.000|20110114171948.000|TR0|it was attributable to -- the cure -- to 
20110114171948.000|20110114171951.000|TR0|some other medical cause, and it really 
20110114171951.000|20110114171953.000|TR0|has to be miraculous.
20110114171953.000|20110114171956.000|TR0|

20110114172003.000|20110114172005.000|TR0|

20110114172030.000|20110114172032.000|TR0|I think, in response to popular demand for 
20110114172032.000|20110114172035.000|TR0|the process to be moved along.  So, you

20110114172040.000|20110114172042.000|TR0|people on the ground.
20110114172042.000|20110114172044.000|TR0|
20110114172044.000|20110114172047.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  I know that right after his 
20110114172047.000|20110114172049.000|TR0|death there were already calls to make 
20110114172049.000|20110114172052.000|TR0|Pope John Paul a saint.  Why do you think 
20110114172052.000|20110114172054.000|TR0|he's so beloved?
20110114172054.000|20110114172057.000|TR0|
20110114172057.000|20110114172059.000|TR0|MARTIN:  That's a difficult question.  I 
20110114172059.000|20110114172102.000|TR0|mean, for many reasons.
20110114172102.000|20110114172104.000|TR0|
20110114172104.000|20110114172106.000|TR0|I think people liked him personally.  I 
20110114172106.000|20110114172109.000|TR0|think they saw a very difficult life that 
20110114172109.000|20110114172111.000|TR0|he led through Nazism and communism.  He 
20110114172111.000|20110114172114.000|TR0|went all around the world, so people had a 
20110114172114.000|20110114172116.000|TR0|chance to see him personally.
20110114172116.000|20110114172119.000|TR0|
20110114172119.000|20110114172121.000|TR0|I think they admired his great faith, his 
20110114172121.000|20110114172124.000|TR0|devotion to Christ, his devotion to Mary, 
20110114172124.000|20110114172126.000|TR0|his many accomplishments.  So, you know, 
20110114172126.000|20110114172128.000|TR0|there are many reasons that people love 
20110114172128.000|20110114172131.000|TR0|John Paul.
20110114172131.000|20110114172133.000|TR0|
20110114172133.000|20110114172136.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  You know, as with everything, 
20110114172136.000|20110114172138.000|TR0|there is controversy surrounding this, 
20110114172138.000|20110114172141.000|TR0|especially from the sex abuse victims, you 
20110114172141.000|20110114172143.000|TR0|know, people who have been victims of 
20110114172143.000|20110114172145.000|TR0|priests within the Catholic Church, 
20110114172145.000|20110114172148.000|TR0|because some of that abuse happened on 
20110114172148.000|20110114172150.000|TR0|Pope John Paul's watch.       MARTIN:  No, 
20110114172150.000|20110114172153.000|TR0|there is.  I mean, a lot of groups are not 
20110114172153.000|20110114172155.000|TR0|happy about this.
20110114172155.000|20110114172158.000|TR0|
20110114172158.000|20110114172200.000|TR0|I think that, you know, when a lot of

20110114173521.000|20110114173523.000|TR0|Old-school paper checks are quickly 
20110114173523.000|20110114173526.000|TR0|becoming a thing of the past. The latest 
20110114173526.000|20110114173528.000|TR0|example, the government is offering to 
20110114173528.000|20110114173531.000|TR0|give some Americans their tax refund on a 
20110114173531.000|20110114173533.000|TR0|prepaid debit card.  Alison Kosik is at 
20110114173533.000|20110114173536.000|TR0|the New York Stock Exchange with the 
20110114173536.000|20110114173538.000|TR0|details.  How does this work, Alison?
20110114173538.000|20110114173541.000|TR0|
20110114173541.000|20110114173543.000|TR0|ALISON KOSIK, CNN BUSINESS CORRESPONDENT: 
20110114173543.000|20110114173545.000|TR0|Well, what this is, Carol, it's a test 
20110114173545.000|20110114173548.000|TR0|program for low-income Americans only.  
20110114173548.000|20110114173550.000|TR0|I'm talking about people who make less 
20110114173550.000|20110114173553.000|TR0|than $35,000 a year.  And what this would 
20110114173553.000|20110114173555.000|TR0|do is it would give their tax refund, 
20110114173555.000|20110114173558.000|TR0|actually direct deposit them on to a 
20110114173558.000|20110114173600.000|TR0|prepaid debit card.
20110114173600.000|20110114173603.000|TR0|
20110114173603.000|20110114173605.000|TR0|Now, the government is going to go ahead 
20110114173605.000|20110114173607.000|TR0|and send out letters next week to about 
20110114173607.000|20110114173610.000|TR0|600,000 people who would be eligible.  It 
20110114173610.000|20110114173612.000|TR0|will tell them how to activate this card 
20110114173612.000|20110114173615.000|TR0|if they choose to do so.  And these 
20110114173615.000|20110114173617.000|TR0|low-income Americans are targeted because 
20110114173617.000|20110114173620.000|TR0|they most likely would not have a bank 
20110114173620.000|20110114173622.000|TR0|account in the first place.
20110114173622.000|20110114173625.000|TR0|
20110114173625.000|20110114173627.000|TR0|Now, keep in mind, this debit card would 
20110114173627.000|20110114173629.000|TR0|have some fees, but it could be worth it 
20110114173629.000|20110114173632.000|TR0|because with a lot of these people who 
20110114173632.000|20110114173634.000|TR0|don't have bank accounts, they have to go 
20110114173634.000|20110114173637.000|TR0|to these check cashing places.  And fees 
20110114173637.000|20110114173639.000|TR0|are often charged there.  Besides, it's 
20110114173639.000|20110114173642.000|TR0|convenient.  They can make purchases with 
20110114173642.000|20110114173644.000|TR0|it, pay bills, make a direct deposit.  It 
20110114173644.000|20110114173646.000|TR0|may be a win-win, Carol.
20110114173646.000|20110114173649.000|TR0|
20110114173649.000|20110114173651.000|TR0|COSTELLO:  Maybe so.  I was just

20110114173659.000|20110114173701.000|TR0|KOSIK: No, no, of course not.  It's all

20110114173704.000|20110114173706.000|TR0|With this prepaid card, the government 
20110114173706.000|20110114173708.000|TR0|only needs to spend about 10 cents for 
20110114173708.000|20110114173711.000|TR0|each card.  And with a paper check it's

20110114173713.000|20110114173716.000|TR0|
20110114173716.000|20110114173718.000|TR0|And it's also part of a bigger push the 
20110114173718.000|20110114173721.000|TR0|government putting underway.  It is
